original_title: BiSH presents PCR is PAiPAi CHiNCHiN ROCK'N'ROLL
overview: The first omnibus film starring "BiSH", also known as “The punk band that doesn’t play any instruments”.  A collaboration with six different directors to create a unique experience that reveals new aspects of "BiSH", from drama to arthouse.
title: BiSH presents PCR is PAiPAi CHiNCHiN ROCK'N'ROLL
